scripts.start: concurrently -n "hardhatStart, nodemon, webpack" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run hardhatStart" "npm run backendDev" "npm run appDev"
scripts.hardhatDeploy: npx hardhat run --network localhost .\scripts\FairInteger.js && npx hardhat run --network localhost .\scripts\StoreMsg.js
scripts.hardhatStart: npm run hardhatDev && npm run hardhatDeploy
